meanings.definition: The quality or state of being green in color.
meanings.sent1: The forest's greennesses were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: I love the greennesses of spring leaves.
meanings.sent3: The greennesses of the grass made the lawn look fresh and inviting.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the greennesses of emeralds.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the vibrant greennesses of the landscape in the painting.

meanings.definition: The presence of vegetation or plant life.
meanings.sent1: The park's greennesses were a haven for birds.
meanings.sent2: The greennesses of the garden were soothing to the eyes.
meanings.sent3: The greennesses of the forest whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: The greennesses of the meadow danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The valley was alive with the greennesses of nature.

meanings.sent1: His greennesses in the business world were evident.
meanings.sent2: She showed her greennesses by asking basic questions.
meanings.sent3: The greennesses of the new intern were endearing to the team.
meanings.sent4: Despite his greennesses, he approached the task with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The greennesses of the young explorer brought a fresh perspective to the expedition.
